example.text: The Arab League, by letting Syria back in, is emboldening not just Bashar al-Assad but also Ebrahim Raisi in Iran & Vladimir Putin in Russia. This is a strategic mistake that will allow bad actors to destabilize the Middle East. [[url]]
The health and wellbeing of our seniors should never be a partisan issue. I will work across the aisle to protect and strengthen Social Security and Medicare for all Americans.

Age should not be a hurdle to achieving the American dream. As we celebrate Older Americans Month, I'm proud to fight for our seniors in Congress by working on bills to support opportunities for senior entrepreneurs & strengthen their benefits. [[url]]

The Arab League, by letting Syria back in, is emboldening not just Bashar al-Assad but also Ebrahim Raisi in Iran & Vladimir Putin in Russia. This is a strategic mistake that will allow bad actors to destabilize the Middle East. [[url]]

I signed a letter to [[user]] calling on the UN to reject male-only humanitarian aid implementation as the Taliban cuts off women & girls from hope, opportunities, or humanitarian assistance. I will continue working to ensure basic rights for Afghan women & girls. [[url]]

We cannot allow foreign drug manufacturers, money launderers, & cartel organizations to profit as Americans suffer from the fentanyl epidemic. I introduced the Stop Fentanyl Money Laundering Act with [[user]] to help us dismantle these networks. [[url]]
